value:
$WmMPID_総選挙門番,ch17_66_Gatekeeper_M_ELECTION01,Face|No matter where I'm stationed, my
only concern is protecting the gate.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Welcome back, King Fáfnir.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|This is it, then? This is what you
were after?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes, it is indeed... To think they
were hiding it here all along.$k$pI am unable to enter this temple,
so you've done me a great service.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|If you have what you want,
I'll be leaving.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Now, now, don't be so impatient.
You don't want to leave just yet.$k$p$EFace_Cool|...Do you know what exactly it was
that you laid claim to in the Emblian
blood temple?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I don't care.$k$p$EFace|Wait—no... This design is familiar...
It looks like the tool Askr's
summoner carries...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Yes, that's right. This is the
summoner's divine weapon
Breidablik...or a fake, anyway.$k$pThere is only one of those in this
world and it is held by Askr.$k$pThis, however, is a mere trinket
pieced together by a pathetic sage
lusting after the power of the gods.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|A...sage, did you say?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I caught wind of the little scheme
of Eitri's and went to take the
weapon for myself.$k$pUnfortunately, I was found out too...$k$pAnd that's when it was hidden away
in a temple warded against my entry,
you see, and...$k$p...$k$p...Ah-hem?! Are you even listening
to what I'm saying?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The sage...created a copy of the
summoner's divine weapon?$k$pNo... It can't be... But if that's
true, then...then... That man from
my memory! From when I arrived!$k$pTell me who he is, Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Cool|To be perfectly honestly, I haven't
the faintest idea what you're talking
about... Some man?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Don't play innocent with me!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Even after all that, I still have no
answers for you. I simply do not
know what you're talking about.$k$pIsn't there someone else you could
ask—someone who might actually
have the answers you seek?$k$pI wonder...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrr...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Brother! There you are!
...And who is this?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Never mind. We're leaving.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but, Brother, what about Embla?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It doesn't matter. I have business
with Eitri!$k$pShe will tell me what I want to know.
They always do...eventually.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But...why Eirtri? Wait, Brother!
What happened?!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Heh... Things seem to be going
according to plan.$k$p*sigh* I suppose since this fake
is no longer of any use to anyone,
I ought to destroy it.$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|Oh, Niðavellir, with your seiðjárn...
You tried to fly a little too high.$k$pYou sought to imitate Askr, to add
their power to your own.$k$pBut such power would be too much
for any one realm. That is not part
of Alfaðör's design...$k$p$Sbs150|
